name: Jacob Jones and the Bigfoot Mystery : Episode 2
description: Jacob Jones is back in Episode 2 of Jacob Jones and the Bigfoot Mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i Series Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: + Pretty graphics + Good voice acting + Optional puzzles + Puzzles are generally fun to solve  - Puzzles seem a tad easier - Seems even shorter than the first episode - Unsatisfying beginning (thanks to the first episode's 'cliffhanger')  [Rating: 80/100]
